entry.title: castaway
entry.summary:
Author: starry_somnia

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,028Chapters: 6/10Kudos: 227

Summary: See, the thing was,“Going somewhere, demon?”The thing was —“Anywhere is better than here, Drake.” The ‘where you are not’ was unspoken — and the message was supposed to be clear. The ‘I should not have done this what the fuck was I thinking’ implied. The ‘I am going to get the hell out of here’ inferred.The thing was, Damian had fucked up. Majorly.Made worse by the fact this wasn't even the first time he’d made this specific mistake, but the third.—aka, estranged trust fund brat, Damian al Ghul Wayne, sleeps with his sworn enemy who is also his brother's best friend, Timothy Drake. Because he has a problem with impulse control — and that's before he gets cut off. There's no way this ends well.

entry.title: Did I Mistake You For A Sign From God?
entry.summary:
Author: arakhnoidsilk

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,928Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 11

Summary: He was about to turn back when he noticed a note written on it."Play me ❤️", it read.Despite himself, he gave in, took the tape player and pressed play."Hello, my Demon Hound," the sound of Tim's voice echoed in the empty alleyway, "been thinking about you a lot lately… We were good together, weren't we?"They were. Despite the crime, Tim had helped Bruce and him an extraordinary number of times, either by hacking into computer systems by himself, or by using his wit to gather intel. The man always had a sharp mind — "Maybe it's time to reignite the flame." — and an even sharper tongue.Damian sighed. The recording was still going when the clicking came back; this time, it rang from the recording.. . - . . . - . - . . . . . . . . . - - .Find me.or; 3 times Stray flirts +1 time in which Batman acts
